    Class
    Description
    class 
    UriAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to a String representing a URI.
    Methods in org.springframework.test.web that return UriAssert
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    UriAssert
    UriAssert.isEqualToTemplate(String uriTemplate, @Nullable Object... uriVars)
    Verify that the actual URI is equal to the URI built using the given uriTemplate and uriVars.
    UriAssert
    UriAssert.matchesAntPattern(String uriPattern)
    Verify that the actual URI matches the given Ant-style uriPattern.
